channel.title: AVG help
channel.description: so i just installed AVG 8.5 and i already got a problem.. it wont let me open windows media player. just doesnt pop up i think one of the avg things are blocking it but, ive searched and searched just cant get it to open still. does anyone else have this kind of problem or had it before? i need some help thanks

item.title: AVG help
item.dc:creator: @darkilla darkilla
item.description:
@darkilla wrote:

lol hahaha nicee nicee i only have xp n vista dualbooted on mines…

Read full topic

item.title: AVG help
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

i tell you this because around a year ago, my computer was infected with trojan(s) (around 2-3 :P) and avg didnt detect shit

i soon got a bsod, so i booted into ubuntu, mounted my windows partition, i saved everything i needed to a usb, i formatted the partition, and installed windows xp sp3 again

those are the advantages of having a dual-boot installation ;D

Read full topic

so yeah ill juss get avast LOL
thanks
